content: लवण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [लू-ल्युट् पृषो° णत्वम्] {@--1@} Saline, saltish, briny. {@--2@} Lovely, handsome. --णः {@--1@} Saline taste. {@--2@} The sea of salt water. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon, son of Madhu, who was killed by Śatrughna; <ls>R. 15. 2</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">5</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">17</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">26</ls>. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a hell. --णं {@--1@} Salt sea-salt. {@--2@} A factitious salt.
